query: I'm a 45-year-old woman experiencing chest pain that started 2 hours ago. It's sharp and gets worse when I breathe deeply. I also feel short of breath.
My 3-year-old son has had a fever of 103Â°F for the past day, along with a rash on his body. He's been very fussy and not eating well.
I've been having persistent lower back pain for about 6 months now. It's worse in the morning and after sitting for long periods. I'm 52 years old.
I'm feeling very depressed and anxious lately. I can't sleep, have no appetite, and feel hopeless. This has been going on for about 2 months.
I'm 67 years old and have been experiencing dizziness and lightheadedness when I stand up. I also feel my heart racing sometimes.
I have a persistent cough that's been going on for 3 weeks. It's mostly dry but sometimes I cough up yellow mucus. I'm a smoker.
My 16-year-old daughter has been having severe headaches almost daily for the past month. They seem to be triggered by stress and lack of sleep.

demographics.medical_history: High school student, high academic stress

query: I'm 8 months pregnant and have been experiencing severe nausea and vomiting that won't stop. I can't keep any food or water down.
I cut my hand while cooking and it's bleeding quite a bit. The cut is about 2 inches long and fairly deep. Should I go to the emergency room?
I've been having trouble with my vision lately. Things seem blurry and I'm seeing halos around lights. I'm diabetic.
